name: bopomofo
description: Tool for studying bopomofo transliteration system

scripts.copy: cp node_modules/jamilih/dist/jml-es.js vendor/jamilih/dist/jml-es.js && cp node_modules/tippy.js/dist/esm/tippy.js vendor/tippy.js/dist/esm/tippy.js && cp node_modules/tippy.js/dist/tippy.css vendor/tippy.js/dist/tippy.css && cp node_modules/load-stylesheets/dist/index-es.js vendor/load-stylesheets/dist/index-es.js && cp node_modules/dialog-polyfill/dialog-polyfill.js vendor/dialog-polyfill/dialog-polyfill.js && cp node_modules/dialog-polyfill/dialog-polyfill.css vendor/dialog-polyfill/dialog-polyfill.css

author: Brett Zamir
